resources.string: Select the number of standard drinks your friend has consumed.\n A standard drink is defined as the amount of alcohol contained in a can of beer.
Fill in the following information to save the BAC to be displayed to your friend in the fake breathalyzer
Fill in the following information to calculate your BAC!

This app is created purely for educational and entertainment purposes. The blood alcohol calculator is based on an formula from WikiHow. The number displayed on the screen does not in any way constitute a medical recommendation. Please consult your physician if you feel ill.
This application acts as a dummy breathalyzer. Preprogram the reading of this breathalyzer by selecting either option below.
Did you know certain smartphones can analyze air humidity?
Calculate a realistic blood alcohol content with a person\'s gender, weight, and the number of drinks they\'ve had.
Set the final BAC for the application to display in the results screen.
Minimal or no alcohol content detected.
You may be experiencing minor memory and motor impairment. Your balance and reaction times are heavily impacted at this level. Take plenty of water and do not drive at this level.

Your mental and physical functions are or will soon be severely impaired. You are at a high risk of asphyxiation due to vomit or a sudden loss of consciousness. Seek help from others around you and medical attention immediately.
